author: gdaniels
msg: Make the secondLevelObjects collection in SerializationContext a Set so
we don't mistakenly serialize things twice.
Add comments explaining an optimization problem in Deserializer.

author: gdaniels
msg: The very beginnings of a change which will enable modification of
SOAPEnvelopes which were deserialized before processing.  Just checking
this in (which changes the serialization a touch, but doesn't break anything)
so I can continue working on it from home later.
